utterance: Create a workback plan for the upcoming CXA Strategic Initiatives Review meeting on Dec 17, 2025.

ground_truth_tasks.milestone_activity: Planner Prep: Review Action tracker, portfolio trends, and KPI scorecard to determine follow-ups and content requests for upcoming SIR meeting. Consult with LT/Leads as needed. Send proposed initiatives focus to Kristie for review/consult with Andy M.
Kristie to consult with Andy M., leveraging Planner's recommendation. Send feedback to Nicolle and Paulina.
Send out call for content/ instructions to all involved/participating teams
Content due in deck by all teams. Guest invite requests due by EOD.
Confirm speaker lineup, presenter order, and any agenda adjustments.
Nicolle to complete QA review and sign off to Kristie/Paulina for agenda distribution. Lock guest invites.
Kristie or delegate to send the finalized agenda to participants.
Publish and share meeting notes with stakeholders
